text: Bhanidinus ki ‘‘mero palanakarta aphna sevakaharumadhye jasako nimti cahancha, jivika pharakilo gardacha ra jasako lagi cahancha sankucita garidincha. Ra jejati timile allahako batoma kharca garyau, tyasako satta timila'i pura pura pratiphala dinecha. Ra u sabaibhanda ramro jivika dinevala ho’’
